statements: DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE id = 1 AND transaction_amount = 100.50
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 123
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'unknown' AND anomaly_description = 'Suspicious activity';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'suspicious' AND transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1000 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM outliers_detection WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' OR amount > 1000.00;
